texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: author: Major Hayden date: '2022-12-15' Podcasts provide a great way to keep up with current events or learn more about the world around us, especially while we're doing other activities. 🎧 tags:
texts.text: author: Major Hayden date: '2022-12-15' Podcasts provide a great way to keep up with current events or learn more about the world around us, especially while we're doing other activities. 🎧 tags:

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: The podcast bug bit me during the pandemic in 2020. As I started the keto diet in late 2019, I converted my lunch time into lunch walk time. That became a great time for listening to podcasts.
texts.text: The podcast bug bit me during the pandemic in 2020. As I started the keto diet in late 2019, I converted my lunch time into lunch walk time. That became a great time for listening to podcasts.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: This post talks about how I consume podcasts and my favorite creators. I plan to keep this post updated over time as I add and remove favorites from my list.
texts.text: This post talks about how I consume podcasts and my favorite creators. I plan to keep this post updated over time as I add and remove favorites from my list.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: I went through plenty of podcast applications on my phone and via web browser, but my all-time favorite is  Pocket Casts . It delivers an excellent experience on a phone that doesn't get in my way. I can set certain podcasts to download automatically over wifi and filter my podcasts in different ways. It also lets me choose which podcasts to automatically add to my "Up Next" queue and which ones must be manually queued.
texts.text: I went through plenty of podcast applications on my phone and via web browser, but my all-time favorite is  Pocket Casts . It delivers an excellent experience on a phone that doesn't get in my way. I can set certain podcasts to download automatically over wifi and filter my podcasts in different ways. It also lets me choose which podcasts to automatically add to my "Up Next" queue and which ones must be manually queued.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: If you pay a little extra for Pocket Casts Plus (about $10 USD/year), you can manage your podcasts on your mobile devices and via a web browser. I love this feature because sometimes I have a few minutes left of a certain podcast when I finish my walk. I can switch to my computer and Pocket Casts picks up in Firefox right where it left off on my phone.
texts.text: If you pay a little extra for Pocket Casts Plus (about $10 USD/year), you can manage your podcasts on your mobile devices and via a web browser. I love this feature because sometimes I have a few minutes left of a certain podcast when I finish my walk. I can switch to my computer and Pocket Casts picks up in Firefox right where it left off on my phone.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Pocket Casts has a great discovery feature to help find new podcasts in different genres or trending podcasts among Pocket Casts users.
texts.text: Pocket Casts has a great discovery feature to help find new podcasts in different genres or trending podcasts among Pocket Casts users.
